pros: great selection of books and gifts
cons: small size compared to other B&N locations
occasional lack of employee presence on lower floors
limited selection in certain genres (e.g. local books)

notable_quotes.best: We love this location and have been coming for years and years! Usually bring my daughter and we go straight to the magna section.
notable_quotes.worst: When I came here in look of a certain book I had wanted, I asked an employee for help, and she literally told me to find it myself...
notable_quotes.funniest: I was really surprised how much was in this store which seems small from outside. I purchased two books but saw soooo many more that I want.

vibe_description: This Barnes & Noble location has a cozy, small-town feel with a modern twist. The staff is friendly and helpful, making it easy to navigate the shelves and find great reads. However, some reviewers noted that the store can feel empty when there aren't enough employees on hand, which may detract from the overall experience.
staff_mentions: Reviewers praised the kindness and helpfulness of B&N staff, with many noting that they were willing to go above and beyond to assist customers. However, some reviewers also mentioned that there could be a greater sense of camaraderie among employees.
recommendation_for: This store would be ideal for fans of local authors and manga/anime, as well as anyone looking for a cozy, low-key bookstore experience in the city.
